all_fluxdata.description: All fluxes referenced for this object.

bibcodelist.description: List of references for an object

cl.g.description: Cluster of Galaxies: Abell & Corwin,Astrophys. J. Suppl.,70,1 (1989)

coo_err_maja.description: major axis of the error ellipse

coo_err_mina.description: minor axis of the error ellipse

dec_prec.description: precision code for the coordinates (ra and dec are no longer distinct)

dim.description: major and minor axis, angle and inclination

dim_wavelength.description: wavelength type in which these dimensions were measured (Radio, IR, Visible, UV, X, Gamma)

dimensions.description: all fields related to object dimensions

distance.description: Measure of distances by several means

einstein.description: The Einstein Observatory Soft X-ray Source List

fe_h.description: Stellar parameters (Teff, log(g) and [Fe/H]) taken from the literature.

flux.description: value of the flux for the given filter

gj.description: Gliese Jahreiss Nearby Stars (Catalog of stars within 20 parsecs of the Sun)

hbet.description: The Hbeta photometric system (Crawford and Mander,1966,Astron. J. 7,114)

hbet1.description: The Hbeta photometric system (Crawford and Mander,1966,Astron. J. 7,114)

hgam.description: Catalogue of equivalent width of Hgamma line from Petrie et al. (1973PDAO...14..151P)

id(1).description: 1 : display the first (main identifier) of the object. Is the same as main_id.

id(cat).description: Creates as much columns as cat entries with the identifier in this nomenclature if it exists. Example: 'id(Gaia|NGC)'. This is case-sensitive.

iras.description: InfraRed Astronomical Satellite Measurements extracted from the IRAS Point Source Catalog, 2nd Edition

irc.description: Infra-red measurements by Neugebauer and Leighton, Caltech, NASA, 1969

mk.description: MK classifications in the Morgan-Keenan system and the Michigan Catalogues of Two-Dimensional Spectral Types for the HD stars (Houk N.,1975,and seq.)

morphtype.description: all fields related to the morphological type

mt_qual.description: morphological type quality (A: best, .., E: worst)

pm.description: proper motion values in right ascension and declination

pm_err_maja.description: major axis of the error ellipse

pm_err_mina.description: minor axis of the error ellipse

propermotions.description: all fields related with the proper motions

ra_prec.description: precision code for the coordinates (ra and dec are no longer distinct)

rv_value.description: Radial velocity value. Eventually translated from a redshift

rvz_error.description: Error. In the same unit as rvz_radvel

rvz_radvel.description:
stored value. Either a radial velocity, or a redshift,
depending on the rvz_type field

sao.description: SAO catalogue (Star catalog of 258997 stars for the epoch and equinox 1950.0,1966)

sp.description: all fields related with the spectral type

td1.description: UV fluxes from TD1 satellite,by Thompson et al.

v*.description: variable stars parameters extracted mainly from the General Catalog of Variable Stars by Kukarkin et al. USSR Academy of Sciences (3rd edition in 1969,and continuations)

velocity.description: all fields related with radial velocity and redshift

z_value.description: Redshift value. Eventually translated from a radial velocity
